title: FIX you search engines
body: why is it that in ranked, you get randoms who decide to play. please fix your search engines to find the appropriate players for each match, you spend enough time on skins and champs, but not enough on the players who get selected in each game. 9 time out of 10 I get a feeder who does not understand league let alone ranked, and its destroying my game, they report me, and I get banned and I get spoken to my riot cause I got to watch my temper when they clearly shouldn't be in the game, sometimes its 4 newbies mostly its 2 or 3, im still in bronze and I know the game well, but please I don't care if I have to wait 5 minutes for a game as long as each side has a fair game. someone please get back to me I cant be the only one experiencing this. and its always on my promotions I get 3 or 4 newbies

replies.body:
You're matched with people who are of your skill level.

>search engines

lol/8
